name: Open WebUI — Unified LLM Chat Interface
description: Connector for Open WebUI (ghcr.io/open-webui/open-webui). Provides an OpenAI-compatible REST API gateway that proxies requests to Ollama, OpenAI, Groq, and other backends. Running locally on port 8090.

auth.notes: Generate an API key in Open WebUI Settings → Account → API Keys. The key grants access to all configured model backends.

local_instance.notes: Instance confirmed running in Docker Desktop. Accessible at http://localhost:8090.

chat_completions.description: OpenAI-compatible chat completions — proxied to configured backends.

body_schema.model: string — prefixed with backend, e.g. ollama/llama3.2

list_models.description: List all available models across all configured backends.

backend_routing.openai: Routes to OpenAI API using OPENAI_API_KEY
backend_routing.groq: Routes to Groq API using GROQ_API_KEY

governance.p008_docker_socket: read-only unless write justified in PR
governance.notes: Open WebUI API key stored as OPENWEBUI_API_KEY secret. The web interface is localhost-only; never expose externally without Cloudflare Access protection.
